General.Name: Yinyi Real Estate Co Ltd
General.Description: Sensteed Hi-Tech Group, through its subsidiaries, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells continuously variable transmission (CVT), dual clutch transmission, hybrid powertrain, and electric powertrain systems for automobile industry in China and internationally. The company also manufactures automotive airbag gas generators. In addition, it develops, manages, and operates real estate properties; and operates hotels. The company was formerly known as Yinyi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sensteed Hi-Tech Group in January 2023. Sensteed Hi-Tech Group was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: Yibin Bund Building, No. 132, Ningbo, China, 315020

6.Name: Mr. Xue Jia Lu
